languages.text: "Кассия Орселлио". {n}Девушка сдержанно кивает.{/n} "Добрые слова не сокроют снежно-синий холод ваших речей, навигатор Ханн. Однако я передам регенту Ааронто, что вы справлялись о его здоровье. Передавайте и вы наилучшие пожелания {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатору{/g} Кассини. А теперь — отложим любезности. Вольный Торговец наверняка желает задать вам несколько вопросов".

traits.locale_text: "Кассия Орселлио". {n}Девушка сдержанно кивает.{/n} "Добрые слова не сокроют снежно-синий холод ваших речей, Навигатор Ханн. Однако я передам регенту Ааронто, что вы справлялись о его здоровье. Передавайте и вы наилучшие пожелания новатору Кассини. А теперь — отложим любезности. Вольный Торговец наверняка желает задать вам несколько вопросов".

languages.text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}She offers a reserved nod.{/n} "Cordiality will not disguise the ice-blue coldness of your words, Navigator Hann. However, I will tell Regent Aaronto that you enquired after his health. You may pass on my best wishes to {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. And now let's set the pleasantries aside. I'm sure the Rogue Trader would like to ask you a few questions."
languages.original_text: "Кассия Орселлио". {n}Девушка сдержанно кивает.{/n} "Добрые слова не сокроют снежно-синий холод ваших речей, навигатор Ханн. Однако я передам регенту Ааронто, что вы справлялись о его здоровье. Передавайте и вы наилучшие пожелания {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатору{/g} Кассини. А теперь — отложим любезности. Вольный Торговец наверняка желает задать вам несколько вопросов".

I'm sure the Rogue Trader would like to ask you a few questions."

"Cassia Orsellio." {n}She offers a reserved nod.{/n} "Cordiality will not disguise the ice-blue coldness of your words, Navigator Hann. However, I will tell Regent Aaronto that you inquired after his health. You may pass on my best wishes to {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. And now let's set the pleasantries aside. I'm sure the Rogue Trader would like to ask you a few questions."

languages.text: 「カシア・オーセリオよ」{n}彼女は控えめにうなずいた。{/n}「言葉は丁寧でもそこに秘められている氷のような冷たさは隠しきれないわね、航宙士ハン。けれど、アーロント摂政にはあなたが彼を気遣っていることを伝えておきましょう。{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノヴァター{/g}・カッシーニによろしく伝えて。さあ、挨拶はこれくらいにしましょうか。自由開拓者からいくつか質問があるようですので」
languages.original_text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}She offers a reserved nod.{/n} "Cordiality will not disguise the ice-blue coldness of your words, Navigator Hann. However, I will tell Regent Aaronto that you enquired after his health. You may pass on my best wishes to {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. And now let's set the pleasantries aside. I'm sure the Rogue Trader would like to ask you a few questions."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア・オーセリオよ」{n}彼女は控えめにうなずいた。{/n}「言葉は丁寧でもそこに秘められている氷のような冷たさは隠しきれないわね、航宙士ハン。けれど、アーロント摂政にはあなたが彼を気遣っていることを伝えておきましょう。{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノヴァター{/g}・カッシーニによろしく伝えて。さあ、挨拶はこれくらいにしましょうか。自由開拓者からいくつか質問があるみたいだから」

languages.text: “卡西娅·奥赛罗向您致意。”{n}卡西娅微微点头。{/n}“亲切的话语无法掩盖您言语中冰蓝色的冷淡，导航者汉恩，但我会将您诚挚的问候转告给阿伦托摄政王，也请您代我向卡西尼{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}致以最诚挚的祝愿。先把寒暄的事情放在一旁吧，我相信行商浪人想问您一些问题。”
languages.original_text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}She offers a reserved nod.{/n} "Cordiality will not disguise the ice-blue coldness of your words, Navigator Hann. However, I will tell Regent Aaronto that you enquired after his health. You may pass on my best wishes to {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. And now let's set the pleasantries aside. I'm sure the Rogue Trader would like to ask you a few questions."

traits.locale_text: “卡西娅·奥塞罗向您致意。”{n}卡西娅微微点头。{/n}“亲切的话语无法掩盖您言语中冰蓝色的冷淡，导航者汉恩，但我会将您诚挚的问候转告给阿伦托摄政王，也请您代我向卡西尼{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}致以最诚挚的祝愿。先把寒暄的事情放在一旁吧，我相信行商浪人想问您一些问题。”

languages.text: «Cassia Orsellio». {n}Asiente cautelosa.{/n} «La cordialidad no ocultará el frío azulado de sus palabras, Navegante Hann. Sin embargo, informaré al regente Aaronto de que ha preguntado por su salud. Por su parte, transmita mis mejores deseos al {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. Y ahora que ya hemos terminado con las formalidades, seguro que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tiene algunas preguntas que hacerle».
languages.original_text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}She offers a reserved nod.{/n} "Cordiality will not disguise the ice-blue coldness of your words, Navigator Hann. However, I will tell Regent Aaronto that you enquired after his health. You may pass on my best wishes to {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. And now let's set the pleasantries aside. I'm sure the Rogue Trader would like to ask you a few questions."

traits.locale_text: «Cassia Orsellio». {n}Asiente cautelosa.{/n} «La cordialidad no ocultará el frío azulado de sus palabras, Navegante Hann. Sin embargo, informaré al regente Aaronto de que ha preguntado por su salud. Por su parte, transmita mis mejores deseos al {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. Y ahora que ya hemos terminado con las formalidades, seguro que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tiene algunas preguntas que hacerle».

languages.text: « Cassia Orsellio, {n}répond-elle avec un hochement de tête réservé.{/n} Cette apparente cordialité ne suffira pas à cacher la froideur glaciale de vos paroles, navigateur Hann, mais je ferai savoir au régent Aaronto que vous avez demandé de ses nouvelles. Vous transmettrez mes salutations au {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. Et maintenant que nous en avons fini avec les civilités, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a certainement des questions à vous poser. »
languages.original_text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}She offers a reserved nod.{/n} "Cordiality will not disguise the ice-blue coldness of your words, Navigator Hann. However, I will tell Regent Aaronto that you enquired after his health. You may pass on my best wishes to {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. And now let's set the pleasantries aside. I'm sure the Rogue Trader would like to ask you a few questions."

traits.locale_text: « Cassia Orsellio, {n}répond-elle avec un hochement de tête réservé.{/n} Cette apparente cordialité ne suffira pas à cacher la froideur glaciale de vos paroles, navigateur Hann, mais je ferai savoir au régent Aaronto que vous avez demandé de ses nouvelles. Vous transmettrez mes salutations au {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. Et maintenant que nous en avons fini avec les civilités, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a certainement des questions à vous poser. »

languages.text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}Sie nickt reserviert.{/n} "Höflichkeit kann die eisige Kälte Eurer Worte nicht kaschieren, Navigator Hann. Ich werde Regent Aaronto dennoch ausrichten, dass Ihr Euch nach seiner Gesundheit erkundigt habt. Bestellt {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini meine besten Wünsche. Und nun sollten wir die Schmeicheleien beenden. Ich bin sicher, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hat einige Fragen an Euch."
languages.original_text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}She offers a reserved nod.{/n} "Cordiality will not disguise the ice-blue coldness of your words, Navigator Hann. However, I will tell Regent Aaronto that you enquired after his health. You may pass on my best wishes to {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. And now let's set the pleasantries aside. I'm sure the Rogue Trader would like to ask you a few questions."

traits.locale_text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}Sie nickt reserviert.{/n} "Höflichkeit kann die eisige Kälte Eurer Worte nicht kaschieren, Navigator Hann. Ich werde Regent Aaronto dennoch ausrichten, dass Ihr Euch nach seiner Gesundheit erkundigt habt. Bestellt {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini meine besten Wünsche. Und nun sollten wir die Schmeicheleien beenden. Ich bin sicher, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hat einige Fragen an Euch."

languages.text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}Hafifçe başını eğiyor.{/n} "Cana yakınlığınız, sözcüklerinizin buz gibi soğukluğunu gizlemekte başarısız Rotacı Hann. Yine de Naip Aaronto'ya sıhhatini sorduğunuzu ileteceğim. Siz de {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} Cassini'ye iyi dileklerimi iletin. Şimdiyse güzel sözleri bir kenara bırakalım. Eminim Hür Tacir'in sormak istediği sorular vardır."
languages.original_text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}She offers a reserved nod.{/n} "Cordiality will not disguise the ice-blue coldness of your words, Navigator Hann. However, I will tell Regent Aaronto that you enquired after his health. You may pass on my best wishes to {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Cassini. And now let's set the pleasantries aside. I'm sure the Rogue Trader would like to ask you a few questions."

traits.locale_text: "Cassia Orsellio." {n}Hafifçe başını eğiyor.{/n} "Cana yakınlığınız, sözcüklerinizin buz gibi soğukluğunu gizleyemiyor Rotacı Hann ancak Naip Aaronto'ya sıhhatini sorduğunuzu ileteceğim. Siz de {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} Cassini'ye en iyi dileklerimi iletin. Güzel sözleri bir kenara bırakalım artık. Eminim Hür Tacir'in sormak istediği bazı sorular vardır."
